titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that any reform of the Social Security Program not include mandatory coverage of State and local employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 9/14/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that no Social Security reform plan favorably considered by Congress should cause State and local government employees covered under public pensions to be forced into coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance (OASDI) program under title II of the Social Security Act.
